Ai Mayuzumi is the daughter of the head of the research lab, and is an expert water jet bike driver. When the terrorist group Error attacks the city Ai becomes involved with the counter-terrorist group Stelnas, comprised of an all-female team, and led by a girl named Kei, and asks to join them. The group initially resists her efforts to join, but a surprising \"gift\" that Ai possesses, along with the way she handles herself during a kidnapping attempt, eventually sways the opinion of the members of Stelnas."},"links":{"al":"30274","ap":"daphne-in-the-brilliant-blue","kt":"636","mal":"274","mu":"26612"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}}]}

Taken in by a dojo and a practitioner of Kenpo, Gennosuke exhibits tremendous skill and a dangerous ferocity.\n\nThe other members of the dojo conspire against him ending with Gennosuke killing the sensei he thought he trusted. Embittered and lonely, he seeks to eliminate those who  wronged him at any cost.  \n\nWas a very controversial work and many copies were recalled. \n\nWhat has been scanlated on MangaDex is a 2004 release that contains censored dialogue (as represented by Xs and Os) along with an essay giving insight on the controversy. What's also included is a redone version entitled *Heed ye Scoundrels* (alternatively, *Heed my Words*).\n\nThe official English version that is linked contains the *uncensored* version with the original dialogue and a 2004 essay, as well as the apologies from Hirata himself as well as the (infamous) Hinomaru Bunko. Publicado en 1962, este tomo vio prohibida su distribución y muchos de sus ejemplares fueron quemados. La razón fue una denuncia que lo acusaba de representar de forma denigrante a la casta Eta, un grupo muy discriminado durante el período Edo. La prohibición duró más de cuarenta años; recién en 2006 los japoneses pudieron leer esta obra, y en una versión censurada."},"links":{"al":"47554","ap":"chidaruma-kenpou-onorera-ni-tsugu","kt":"4955","mal":"17554","mu":"9hfmt00"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

The next time he wakes up, he's not in a castle with a king, but in a deep forest since the summoning failed! You'd think he'd be at a loss, but he starts living a life of survival with a positive attitude that doesn't involve deep thought! b44565f2-e1e8-400a-9b42-983832e44c15:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b44565f2-e1e8-400a-9b42-983832e44c15","title":{"en":"The Voices That Call Me"},"availableTranslatedLanguages":["it","en","ru"],"description":{"en":"Kaoru was an aspiring mangaka, with big dreams and (what he thought was, and still does think,) oodles of talent. b45f6d31-8cf9-4803-8d56-222c3f158c4f:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b45f6d31-8cf9-4803-8d56-222c3f158c4f","title":{"en":"Doga"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Doga of the Great Arch"},{"ja":"ドガ"}],"description":{"en":"Yote is as high-ranked as he is unaware of the reality of the world. As a new lord, he gets the opportunity to leave his castle for the first time of his life to explore the free city of Leoure. But as Yote just starts to get a glimpse of what kindness and freedom look like, he is killed by street robbers. The young man is saved by a mysterious woman who happens to be a talented inventor. She transfers his mind into a cyborg body, allowing him to survive... for a year or two.\n\nYote is now a robot hardly able to move around by himself. But whatever, for him it's the first day of a new life! But to have a life, he needs to become human again. Only the legendary mermaids are said to have the magical powers to achieve such miracles. To help him on his hazardous journey, he hires Doga, a strong and witty street orphan ready to do anything to get out of Leoure and see the world. هل هذا حلم؟! همف. إذا لم أستيقظ من هذا الحلم ، سوف أعيش على الأقل دون الكثير من الاهتمام للآخرين الآن! تماما مثل ذلك ، قرر هاري أن يذهب إلى الظلال!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B7%B8-%EC%98%A4%EB%B9%A0%EB%93%A4%EC%9D%84-%EC%A1%B0%EC%8B%AC%ED%95%B4/2367), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54286072)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/harley-takes-the-house/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](http://kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/7024/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%BE%81%E6%9C%8D%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E8%A8%8E%E5%8E%AD%E9%AC%BC%E5%93%A5%E5%93%A5/216)\n* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/mes-freres-infernaux)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Beware-of-the-Brothers/158)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/55776)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/246)","en":"Harley, a destitute girl, got adopted by Duke Ernst at 7 years old when she lost her mother, as the Ernsts had themselves lost their youngest daughter Arina and sought Harley due to her resemblance to the late girl. Even though she received all kinds of persecution by the three Ernst sons in 20 years of life at the Ernst estate, she could finally escape that blood-and-tear inducing life when she was about to get married.\n\n*But what is this? When I woke up from my sleep, I'm back to that hellish childhood! Is this a dream?! Hmph. If I can't wake up from this dream,  I'll at least live without too much consideration for others now!*\n\nJust like that, Harley decided to go astray. Eugene, the \"dutiful son\" but cold, Cabel, the roughhousing knucklehead, and Erich, the angelic-looking bully and Arina's twin, *all three be damned!*\n\n----\nHarley thought that marriage would be her ticket out of the Ernst household and away from the family's three sons, aka her perpetual tormenters. But on the eve of her wedding, she's transported back in time 20 years to a youth she'd hoped to forget. As long as she's getting a second chance at childhood, Harley's determined to stand up to her bullies. But what began as retaliation quickly turns into reconciliation as both Harley and the Ernst brothers come to understand each other's pain.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B7%B8-%EC%98%A4%EB%B9%A0%EB%93%A4%EC%9D%84-%EC%A1%B0%EC%8B%AC%ED%95%B4/2367), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54286072)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/harley-takes-the-house/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](http://kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/7024/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%BE%81%E6%9C%8D%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E8%A8%8E%E5%8E%AD%E9%AC%BC%E5%93%A5%E5%93%A5/216)\n* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/mes-freres-infernaux)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Beware-of-the-Brothers/158)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/55776)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/246)","fr":"Ressemblant comme deux gouttes d'eau à leur fille décédée, Hari a été recueillie par le duc Erenst à l'âge de 7 ans. Un an plus tard, après la mort de leurs parents dans un accident, sa relation avec les fils Erenst n'a fait qu'empirer. Les années passent et Hari est désormais une belle femme de 27 ans qui attend de pied ferme son mariage pour enfin se libérer de ses bourreaux. Enter Valia Dean, who just overcame her second near-death experience as a destitute orphan. In order to save Karl, the senile mercenary who raised her in her late parents' absence, Valia volunteers to marry Marquess Shuden Gartt, whose reputation for massacre pales in frightfulness to the coldness of his gaze. Valia, hardened by misfortune, orphancy, starvation, and betrayal, accepts what seems to be certain death. Even in marriage, she will not love. It won't matter how handsome, rich, gentle, chivalrous, and caring he is, or how lovingly he behaves as her husband, right?\n\n_\n\nValia was born into a fallen noble family as the daughter of a knight and lived a sad life. Then, the opportunity of a second life comes to her.\n\n‘Should I live like that again?’\n\nNo, she won’t!\n\nValia decides to become a temple princess in order to live a happier life without having to worry about money. Valia knows this, but she can’t get away from Shuden, who is in love with her!\n\nValia, Shuden’s princess–what is her fate?\n\n“You are the only one in my life that I will love. دي بلانش زوجة زكاري دي أرنو ، ولكن بعد وفاته ، طُردت من عائلة أرنو بسبب الترف والفساد.\n بعد أن لم تتجول في أي مكان حتى سقوط والدها ، عائلة بلانش ، تم اقتيادها إلى دير رثّ.\n وفي النهاية ماتت في النهاية على الأرضية الحجرية الباردة.\n الشرير الذي لا يعرف الشرف. كانت هذه هي الحياة قبل عودة بيانكا.\n\n===\n “هل هذا حقيقي؟ هل عدت إلى الماضي؟ ”\n إنه ليس حلما أو هلوسة. هذا الجوع والتعب والحيوية … كل هذا كان حقيقيًا. حقًا ، إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، إذا أعطاني الله فرصة ثمينة أخرى …!\n\n سأقوم بأعمال تجارية. الزواج هو أيضا عمل.\n\n سيكون ابن زكاري مصدرًا جيدًا للأعمال التجارية. سيحمي طفله مهرتي أيضًا. لن يتم نزع قلعة بلانش ولا مقاطعة أرنو بسبب هذا الفيكونت اللعين.\n\n “للقيام بذلك ، يجب أن أنجب طفل زكاري ، زوجي من حياتي السابقة.”\n\n “كم هو مهر زفافنا؟”\n\n “400 عجول ، 900 خنزير ، 100 سلطانية فضية ، 300 حرير ، صندوقان من المجوهرات ، وجزء من التركة … كان هذا يعادل ميزانية عائلة أرنو لمدة عامين. ”\n\n “إذن ، ألا يجب أن أدفع مقابل ذلك؟”\n\n وسواء أغريته أو أقنعته ، لا بد لي من الزواج من زكاري.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:**\n* R19: [Joara](https://www.joara.com/book/1476677), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60374376), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1239007032)\n* de Arno bola bezohľadná grófka v Sevranskom kráľovstve, neslávne známa ako zlá a sebecká manželka. Pred smrťou sa modlí za druhú šancu a prebudí sa vo svojom 19-ročnom tele. While her husband, Count Zachary de Arno, bravely risked his life out on the battlefield, she sat at home and spent his money. It wasn’t until her final day that Bianca realized the error of her ways. Before she died, Bianca prayed for a second chance, swearing she would do better, and woke up in her 19-year-old body. With her second chance, Bianca starts to see everything in a new light... starting with her husband.\n\n---\nBianca de Blanchefort. The wife of Zachary de Arno, thrown out of Arno family after his death due to her self-indulgent, frivolous, and immoral behavior. She had nowhere to go, the Blanchefort family having already fallen to ruin, and was more or less kicked to a convent out in the border. A woman who ultimately met her end on a cold stone floor. A villainess with no honor: that was Bianca’s life before she went back in time.\n\n===\n“Is this truly reality? Did I really travel back to the past?”\n\nThis was neither a dream nor a hallucination. This feeling of hunger, fatigue, the vivid sense of everything around her… This was all real. If this was indeed reality… If God truly gave her one more precious chance…!\n\n‘I’m going to carry out a business. A marriage is a business in the end. Zachary’s child will be the perfect source of financial support. I’m sure my dowry will remain safe too. I won’t have to lose the Blanchefort or Arno territories to that damned viscount either.’\n\nThen whether it be through seduction or persuasion, she needed to give birth to her husband, Zachary’s child.\n\n“How much was my dowry exactly?”\n\n“400 calves, 900 pigs, 100 units of silverware, 300 rolls of silk, 2 crates of jewels, and a portion of a territory… Equivalent to a two-year budget for the Arno county.”\n\n“Don’t you think you should compensate for that?”\n\n---\n**Original Novel:**\n* R19: [Joara](https://www.joara.com/book/1476677), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60374376), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1239007032)\n* R15: [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52329538), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=3947957)\n\n**Original Webtoon:**\n* R19: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%9E%A5%EC%82%AC/2859), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60374376)\n* R15: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%9E%A5%EC%82%AC19%EC%84%B8-%EC%99%84%EC%A0%84%ED%8C%90/3046), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60343223)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/marriage-of-convenience-comic/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32044)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A9%9A%E5%A7%BB%E9%80%99%E9%96%80%E7%94%9F%E6%84%8F/322)\n* [French / Français](https://piccoma.com/fr/product/446)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Marriage-Business/565)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://mechacomic.jp/books/154355)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81/371)","es":"Blanca de Blanchefort. Una mujer que era la esposa de Zachary de Arno, pero que fue expulsada de la familia Arno después de su muerte por motivos de lujo, inmoralidad y lascivia. Una mujer que estuvo a punto de ser expulsada a un monasterio en la destartalada frontera tras vagar sin rumbo debido a la caída de su familia paterna, la familia Blanchefort. Y al final, una mujer que finalmente murió en el frío suelo de piedra. Una mujer sin honor. Esa era la vida antes del regreso de Bianca. *** “¿Es esto real? ¿De verdad he vuelto al pasado? “No es un sueño ni una alucinación. Esta hambre, cansancio, viveza… Todo es real.” “Dios me ha dado otra valiosa oportunidad…!” El matrimonio es un negocio después de todo. Tener un hijo de Zachary será una buena fuente de negocios. Mantendré mi dote. El maldito vizconde no se llevará el territorio de Blanchefort y el territorio de Arno. “Debo tener un hijo con mi esposo, Zachary.” “¿No debería valer la pena?” O seducirlo o persuadirlo… Esa es la cuestión.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:**\n* R19: [Joara](https://www.joara.com/book/1476677), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60374376), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1239007032)\n* R15: [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52329538), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=3947957)\n\n**Original Webtoon:**\n* R19: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%9E%A5%EC%82%AC/2859), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60374376)\n* R15: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%9E%A5%EC%82%AC19%EC%84%B8-%EC%99%84%EC%A0%84%ED%8C%90/3046), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60343223)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/marriage-of-convenience-comic/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32044)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A9%9A%E5%A7%BB%E9%80%99%E9%96%80%E7%94%9F%E6%84%8F/322)\n* [French / Français](https://piccoma.com/fr/product/446)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Marriage-Business/565)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://mechacomic.jp/books/154355)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81/371)","fr":"Quand le Comte d'Arno meurt sur le champ de bataille, il laisse derrière lui sa femme, Bianca d'Arno. Tapi sama seperti masa lalu, tidak ada seorang pun di county Arno yang menyukai dirinya. Maka itu, Bianca membutuhkan anak yang bisa menjadi penerus yang bisa mengubah posisinya yang dikucilkan. Ia pun bertekad untuk menjalankan tugasnya sebagai istri dan melahirkan penerus count Arno.\n\n---\nBianca de Blanche, FL kita, dibuang oleh keluarga Arno setelah kematian mantan suaminya, Zakari de Arno. Karena keluarganya juga jatuh, akhirnya dia terpaksa tinggal di biara hingga akhir hidupnya. Dan seperti biasa... dia kembali ke masa lalu. Karena Bianca tidak mau mengulang hal yang sama, dia mengajukan pernikahan kontrak dengan mantan suaminya dulu. Dia berpikir, kalau dia punya anak dari Zakari, dia gak akan dibuang lagi oleh keluarga suaminya dan bisa hidup tenang. Apa kehidupan pernikahan kontrak ini akan berjalan mulus seperti yang dia harapkan?\n\n---\n**Original Novel:**\n* R19: [Joara](https://www.joara.com/book/1476677), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60374376), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1239007032)\n* R15: [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52329538), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=3947957)\n\n**Original Webtoon:**\n* R19: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%9E%A5%EC%82%AC/2859), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60374376)\n* R15: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%9E%A5%EC%82%AC19%EC%84%B8-%EC%99%84%EC%A0%84%ED%8C%90/3046), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60343223)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/marriage-of-convenience-comic/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32044)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A9%9A%E5%A7%BB%E9%80%99%E9%96%80%E7%94%9F%E6%84%8F/322)\n* [French / Français](https://piccoma.com/fr/product/446)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Marriage-Business/565)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://mechacomic.jp/books/154355)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81/371)","it":"Bianca de Blanche era la moglie di Zachary de Arno, ma dopo la sua morte fu espulsa dalla famiglia Arno a causa del suo comportamento autoindulgente, frivolo e immorale. ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81/371)","ko":"비앙카 드 블랑쉐포르.\n\n자카리 드 아르노의 아내였지만 그의 사후, 사치와 배덕함, 그리고 음탕함을 명분으로 아르노가(家)에서 내쳐진 여자. 친가인 블랑쉐포르가(家)의 몰락으로 오갈 데 없이 방황한 끝에 초라한 변방의 수도원으로 쫓겨나다시피 한 여자. 그리고 그 끝에 결국 차가운 돌바닥 위에서 죽게 된 여자.\n\n명예를 모르는 악녀.\n\n그것이 바로 비앙카의 회귀 전 생이었다.\n\n===\n\n“이게 현실이라고? 정말, 과거로 돌아온 거란 말이야?”\n\n꿈도, 환각도 아니다. 이 배고픔은, 피로는, 생생함은….\n이 모든 것은 현실이었다.\n\n정말, 정말 그렇다면. 신이 나에게 다시 한 번의 값진 기회를 주신 거라면…!\n\n‘나는 장사를 하는 거야. 결혼도 결국 장사니까. 자카리의 아이는 좋은 장사 밑천이 되어 줄 거야. 내 지참금도 지켜 주겠지. 블랑쉐포르 영지도, 아르노 영지도 그 빌어먹을 자작에게 빼앗기지 않게 될 거야.’\n\n그러려면 그녀의 남편, 자카리의 아이를 낳아야 한다.\n\n“우리의 결혼은 얼마짜리 결혼이었죠?”\n“송아지 400마리, 돼지 900마리, 은그릇 100개, 비단 300필, 보석 두 궤짝, 그리고 영지 일부분…. 아르노가의 이 년 치 예산 만큼이었지.”\n“그 값은 해야 하지 않겠어요?”\n\n그를 유혹해서든, 설득해서든.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:**\n* R19: [Joara](https://www.joara.com/book/1476677), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60374376), de Blanche era a esposa de Zachary de Arno, mas após sua morte, ela foi expulsa da família Arno por luxo e imoralidade.\n\nDepois de vagar sem propósito após a queda de seu pai e da família Blanche, ela é levada para um monastério de periferia.\n\nE no final, ela acabou morrendo no chão de pedra fria.\n\nUma vilã que não conhece a honra. Essa era sua vida antes do retorno de Bianca.\n\n===\n\n“Isto é real? Eu voltei ao passado?”\n\nNão é um sonho ou uma alucinação. Essa fome, fadiga, vivacidade… Tudo isso era real. Realmente, se sim, se Deus me desse mais uma oportunidade preciosa…!\n\n‘Vou fazer negócios. O casamento também é um negócio.’\n\nO filho de Zachary será uma boa fonte de negócios. O filho dele também protegerá meu dote. Nem a fortaleza Blanche, nem a província de Arno serão levadas por aquele maldito visconde.\n\n‘Para fazer isso, tenho que dar à luz o filho de Zachary, meu marido da minha vida anterior.’\n\n“Quanto é o nosso dote de casamento?”\n\n“400 bezerros, 900 porcos, 100 tigelas de prata, 300 sedas, dois baús de joias e uma parte da propriedade… Isso era tanto quanto o orçamento de dois anos da família Arno. “\n\n“Então, eu não deveria ter que pagar por isso?”\n\nQuer eu o tente ou o convença, tenho que ficar com Zachary.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:**\n* R19: [Joara](https://www.joara.com/book/1476677), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60374376), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1239007032)\n* R15: [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52329538), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=3947957)\n\n**Original Webtoon:**\n* R19: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%9E%A5%EC%82%AC/2859), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60374376)\n* R15: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%9E%A5%EC%82%AC19%EC%84%B8-%EC%99%84%EC%A0%84%ED%8C%90/3046), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60343223)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/marriage-of-convenience-comic/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32044)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A9%9A%E5%A7%BB%E9%80%99%E9%96%80%E7%94%9F%E6%84%8F/322)\n* [French / Français](https://piccoma.com/fr/product/446)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Marriage-Business/565)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://mechacomic.jp/books/154355)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81/371)","ru":"Бьянка де Бланшфор. Женщина, в итоге встретившая свой конец на холодном каменном полу. Once released, Hanawa set about creating this autobiographical record of his life behind bars. The first few chapters relate to his incarceration in jail whilst awaiting trial and the rest of the work covers his actual prison sentance. There is no ongoing plot but, rather, each chapter relates in minute detail the customs and rituals of prison life - food, clothing, rules, work, exercise, bathing and so on and so forth. The only things omitted are the background of the author's crime, trial, sentancing and release but an interview with the author and a commentary by the anime critic Tomohide Kure (who was involved in Hanawa's defence) are included to shed some light on these aspects."},"links":{"al":"33983","ap":"doing-time","engtl":"https://www.amazon.com/Doing-Time-Kazuichi-Hanawa/dp/8493340901","kt":"8771","mal":"3983","mu":"5875"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

That is Hakuba Doji!\n\nFrom January to September 1960, a total of 38 episodes (9 episodes) were aired on the NET (currently TV Asahi) series, and a movie version was also produced. It is a story about transforming into a white horse boy and defeating villains with his deadly electric lightning two-sword style to solve various incidents that occur on the way to Edo.\n\nThe main characters Hakuba Doji and Aoi Taro are the new face Shingo Yamashiro, who starred in Toei's first period drama \"Kaze Kozo\". It became a work that pushed up to the national level.\n\nThis book is the first book that contains the full story of the manga version serialized in the monthly magazine \"Shonen Gaho\" almost at the same time as the TV drama aired. The artist is Daiji Kazumine, who has worked on many manga adaptations of live-action works such as \"Nanairo Kamen,\" \"National Kid,\" and \"Ultra Seven.\" \"Duel of Nanbanji\", \"Counterattack Arashigahara\", \"Terror of the Iron Mask\", \"Duel on Itsukushima\", \"Devil's Elixir\", \"Black Wind Party's Counterattack\", \"Bozu Change\", \"Haunted White Butterfly\", \"Phantom Thief Ranbu\" And the composition is faithful to the TV, and the TV version fans are satisfied with the comicalization."},"links":{"mu":"0u3ozy2"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}}]}

b55a0573-17d7-4432-be60-e65ad66e1202:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b55a0573-17d7-4432-be60-e65ad66e1202","title":{"en":"Rewriting My Husband's Tragic Ending"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"피폐물 주인공의 부인이 되었습니다"},{"ko-ro":"Pipyemul Juingongui Buini Doeeotseumnida"},{"ko-ro":"Pipyemul Juingong'eui Buin'i Doeeossseubnida"},{"en":"I Became the Wife of a Tragedy's Main Lead"},{"en":"I Got Married in a Hardboiled Fiction"},{"fr":"Mariée au héros d'une tragédie"},{"es":"Me convertí en la esposa del protagonista principal de una tragedia"},{"th":"ฉันกลายเป็นภรรยาในนิยายโศกนาฏกรรม"},{"ja":"冷血皇子と捨てられた王女"},{"zh":"我成了暗黑系小说主人公的夫人"},{"zh":"成为废物男主的妻子"},{"zh-hk":"成為致鬱小說主角的夫人"},{"id":"Aku Menjadi Istri Tokoh Utama Novel Tragedi"}],"lastChapter":"72","availableTranslatedLanguages":["es-la"],"description":{"en":"Living alone as an abandoned princess of the Kingdom of Anzak, I discovered I was in fact in a trashy novel which appeared in my dreams one day. My half-sister was the novel's heroine, while the male lead was well-known to be cruel and heartless. I was just an extra who died before all the drama started. Sold as a scapegoat for the Halvenkia Empire's peace treaty, I was destined to die, unable to escape my fate.\n\n\"I'm the only man in Halvenkia who's still single. Don't you fancy me?\"\n\nBut all of a sudden, the main character wants to marry me. Your first love, first kiss, and first fling are all with the heroine, but could I take them all for myself?\n\nAlexia, struggling to alter the story in order to survive. Tervion, wanting to keep her all for himself. And Ophelia, the unknown heroine. The original story has now begun to flow in a completely different direction. This is romance fantasy which covers Alexia and Tervion's dreams and fantasies, as the only ones in each other's eyes.\n\n---\n\nAs the bastard child of Anzak's king, Alexia knew she was destined for very little. \"The Book of Wolves\" foretold her destiny as a side character, from her impoverished childhood to her brutal death at the hands of the enemy prince, Tervion. But when Alexia is sent to assassinate him, the story changes. Now she's engaged to him as part of the peace treaty between their two countries. In the face of mortal danger and abandoned by a loveless father in enemy lands, Alexia must decide where her loyalties lie and whose life matters most.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%94%BC%ED%8F%90%EB%AC%BC-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EA%B3%B5%EC%9D%98-%EB%B6%80%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2495), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56940906)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/rewriting-my-husbands-tragic-ending/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30063)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%88%90%E7%82%BA%E8%87%B4%E9%AC%B1%E5%B0%8F%E8%AA%AA%E4%B8%BB%E8%A7%92%E7%9A%84%E5%A4%AB%E4%BA%BA/269)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/338)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Aku-Menjadi-Istri-Tokoh-Utama-Novel-Tragedi/400)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77819)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A8%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8F%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A1/317)","id":"Pada suatu hari, aku yang hidup kesepian sebagai putri kerajaan Anzac yang terbuang menyadari bahwa tempat ini adalah di dalam novel tragedi.\nTokoh utama wanita novel ini adalah adik satu ayahku, sedangkan tokoh utama prianya adalah pangeran yang terkenal kejam. Shocked and indignant, Sao runs out of Grandpa's house saying she's going back to Tokyo, and has a fateful encounter with Gon the horse. Gon used to be a strong racehorse, but he became afraid of the race after falling over due to an inexperienced jockey in a horse race, and he stopped listening to people at all. Sao, who wants to see Gon, who has closed his heart, overlaps with her, tries to get him to recover, but he doesn't listen to what he says... Затем началась история о том, как Хироки становится великолепным мастером исцеления, который может уклоняться от самых жестоких атак боссов."},"links":{"al":"110941","ap":"kanzen-kaihi-healer-no-kiseki","bw":"series/223172/list","kt":"55532","mal":"119818","mu":"cn4tvz4","nu":"kanzen-kaihi-healer-no-kiseki","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF00000160010000_68/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

However, as soon as he opens the application, a green snake suddenly pops out from his phone screen and bites his neck, leaving him unconscious. Waking up in the infirmary without any signs of a snake bite, he is told by the school to take the rest of the day off. Although he is puzzled by what has happened, he dismisses the surreal experience as a hallucination and boards the train home.  \nUnfortunately, his curiosity gets the better of him and he uses the application once again. As the application appears to be just like any other battle game, Kaname breathes out a sigh of relief and decides to start his first match. However, the pleasant surprise is short-lived, as his in-game opponent unexpectedly appears right in front of him and attempts to hunt him down with a knife.  \nAs he desperately runs for his life, Kaname puts two and two together and realizes that Darwin’s Game is not an ordinary game, but rather, it’s a brutal fight for survival.","vi":"Học sinh trung học Kaname Sudou nhận được lời mời từ một người bạn cùng lớp để chơi Trò chơi của Darwin, một trò chơi di động mà cậu chưa bao giờ nghe nói đến. Tuy nhiên, khi vừa mở ứng dụng, một con rắn lục bất ngờ chui ra từ màn hình điện thoại và cắn vào cổ khiến anh bất tỉnh. Tỉnh dậy trong bệnh xá mà không có biểu hiện gì của rắn cắn, anh được nhà trường thông báo cho nghỉ hết ngày. Mặc dù bối rối trước những gì đã xảy ra, anh ta gạt bỏ trải nghiệm siêu thực như một ảo giác và lên tàu về nhà.Thật không may, sự tò mò của anh ấy càng tốt hơn và anh ấy sử dụng ứng dụng một lần nữa. Khi ứng dụng trông giống như bất kỳ trò chơi chiến đấu nào khác, Kaname thở phào nhẹ nhõm và quyết định bắt đầu trận đấu đầu tiên của mình. Tuy nhiên, điều bất ngờ thú vị chỉ tồn tại trong thời gian ngắn, khi đối thủ trong trò chơi của anh ta bất ngờ xuất hiện ngay trước mặt anh ta và cố gắng săn lùng anh ta bằng một con dao.Khi anh ta tuyệt vọng chạy cho cuộc sống của mình, Kaname đặt hai và hai lại với nhau và nhận ra rằng Trò chơi của Darwin không phải là một trò chơi bình thường, mà đúng hơn, đó là một cuộc chiến tàn khốc để sinh tồn"},"links":{"al":"78881","ap":"darwins-game","bw":"series/17543/list","kt":"6449","mal":"48881","mu":"cvnwr9c"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"2d1f5d56-a1e5-4d0d-a961-2193588b08ec","name":{"en":"Loli"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"9438db5a-7e2a-4ac0-b39e-e0d95a34b8a8","name":{"en":"Video Games"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

Ever since he stole the top seat in the class from her, Yukino has hated him, and has been plotting on how to take back her former place as the object of all other students' admiration.
